    <link rel="alternate" type="text/html" href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/reporter-grills-colorado-senate-hopeful-ballot-signatures"/>
    <title>Reporter Corners GOP Candidate For Awkward Grilling On Forged Signatures (VIDEO)</title>
    <content type="html"><p>Despite the tangible awkwardness of the on-camera conversation, a reporter doggedly grilled a U.S. Senate candidate on Thursday about the allegedly forged signatures that got him on the Republican primary ballot in Colorado.</p> <a href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/reporter-grills-colorado-senate-hopeful-ballot-signatures" class="read-more">Read More&nbsp;&rarr;</a></content>

  </entry>
  <entry>
    <id>249630</id>
    <published>2016-05-12T16:41:14-04:00</published>
    <updated>2016-05-12T16:41:14-04:00</updated>
    <link rel="alternate" type="text/html" href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/facebook-explains-trending-news-curation-amid-backlash"/>
    <title>Facebook Explains Its Trending News Curation Amid Leaks, Allegations Of Bias</title>
    <content type="html"><p>Facebook <a href="https://newsroom.fb.com/news/2016/05/information-about-trending-topics/">clarified its policies</a> for choosing trending news topics on Thursday, following a rough week for the company that began with backlash to a <a href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/gizmodo-reports-facebook-suppresses-conservative-news">report </a>alleging the social network's "news curators" suppressed conservative news.</p> <a href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/facebook-explains-trending-news-curation-amid-backlash" class="read-more">Read More&nbsp;&rarr;</a></content>
    <author>
      <name>Kristin Salaky</name>
    </author>
    <meta published="1463085674" updated="1463085674" permalink="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/facebook-explains-trending-news-curation-amid-backlash" image="http://a1.img.talkingpointsmemo.com/image/upload/c_fill,fl_keep_iptc,g_faces,h_365,w_652/uzfnyhvufqrlhhgddede.jpg"/>
  </entry>
  <entry>
    <id>249632</id>
    <published>2016-05-12T16:24:58-04:00</published>
    <updated>2016-05-12T16:24:58-04:00</updated>
    <link rel="alternate" type="text/html" href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/feds-wont-withhold-funding-north-carolina-hb2"/>
    <title>Obama Admin Won’t Withhold Funds From North Carolina Over Anti-LGBT Law</title>
    <content type="html"><p>The White House said Thursday that it doesn't plan to withhold federal funding from North Carolina while the state and the Justice Department fight a legal battle over an anti-LGBT law.</p> <a href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/feds-wont-withhold-funding-north-carolina-hb2" class="read-more">Read More&nbsp;&rarr;</a></content>
    <author>
      <name>Allegra Kirkland</name>
    </author>
    <meta published="1463084698" updated="1463084698" permalink="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/feds-wont-withhold-funding-north-carolina-hb2" image="http://a1.img.talkingpointsmemo.com/image/upload/c_fill,fl_keep_iptc,g_faces,h_365,w_652/dagvhh7do6wfamjaijka.jpg"/>
  </entry>
  <entry>
    <id>249627</id>
    <published>2016-05-12T15:42:57-04:00</published>
    <updated>2016-05-12T15:42:57-04:00</updated>
    <link rel="alternate" type="text/html" href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/rubio-knows-exactly-when-the-filding-deadline-is-to-run-for-florida-senate"/>
    <title>Rubio Knows Exactly When The Florida Filing Deadline Is For His Senate Seat</title>
    <content type="html"><p>Since dropping out of the presidential race, Sen. Marco Rubio (R-FL) has said he isn't reconsidering his decision not to seek another term in the U.S. Senate, but he knows exactly when the deadline is to change his mind and run again. </p>

<p>In a brief hallway interview Thursday on Capitol Hill, Rubio obfuscated when asked if he was at all tempted to run again for his Senate seat. </p>

<p>"I'm not focused on that. I've already said what my intentions are and at this point you know [we] have people out there running already," Rubio said. </p>

<p>Reminded that he had until the end of June, the interview concluded. Rubio walked away, turned, smiled and said, "June 24."</p>

<p>His office said Rubio's plans for 2017 are still unchanged and that he was making the comment in jest. </p>

<p>"It was a joke. He’s going to serve out the rest of his Senate term and become a private citizen in January 2017," a spokesman from his office said.</p> <a href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/rubio-knows-exactly-when-the-filding-deadline-is-to-run-for-florida-senate" class="read-more">Read More&nbsp;&rarr;</a></content>
    <author>
      <name>Lauren Fox</name>
    </author>
    <meta published="1463082177" updated="1463082177" permalink="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/rubio-knows-exactly-when-the-filding-deadline-is-to-run-for-florida-senate" image="http://a3.img.talkingpointsmemo.com/image/upload/c_fill,fl_keep_iptc,g_faces,h_365,w_652/dhz8h24daskckvhhexvl.jpg"/>
  </entry>
  <entry>
    <id>249625</id>
    <published>2016-05-12T15:35:06-04:00</published>
    <updated>2016-05-12T15:35:06-04:00</updated>
    <link rel="alternate" type="text/html" href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/obama-2016-election-republican-course-correction"/>
    <title>Obama Predicts 2016 Election Will Course-Correct An 'Extreme' GOP</title>
    <content type="html"><p>President Barack Obama thinks that the 2016 presidential election could trigger the “corrective” he thinks the Republican Party needs in order to not fall prey to its most “extreme” elements.</p> <a href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/obama-2016-election-republican-course-correction" class="read-more">Read More&nbsp;&rarr;</a></content>
    <author>
      <name>Allegra Kirkland</name>
    </author>
    <meta published="1463081706" updated="1463081706" permalink="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/obama-2016-election-republican-course-correction" image="http://a5.img.talkingpointsmemo.com/image/upload/c_fill,fl_keep_iptc,g_faces,h_365,w_652/r3lrsaoizvgvkei4xdnt.jpg"/>
  </entry>
  <entry>
    <id>249624</id>
    <published>2016-05-12T14:48:34-04:00</published>
    <updated>2016-05-12T14:48:34-04:00</updated>
    <link rel="alternate" type="text/html" href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/greg-abbott-hb2-fight-back"/>
    <title>Texas Guv Ready To 'Fight Back' For North Carolina Anti-LGBT Bill</title>
    <content type="html"><p>Texas Gov. Greg Abbott (R) on Thursday said that he will support North Carolina in its legal battle with the federal government over the controversial new anti-LGBT law.</p>

<p>"I am working with the governor of North Carolina, and we are going to fight back," <a href="http://www.nbcdfw.com/news/politics/Gov-Greg-Abbott-Lt-Gov-Dan-Patrick-to-Speak-at-GOP-Convention-in-Dallas-379193041.html">Abbott said</a> during his speech at the Texas Republican Convention.</p> <a href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/greg-abbott-hb2-fight-back" class="read-more">Read More&nbsp;&rarr;</a></content>
    <author>
      <name>Caitlin MacNeal</name>
    </author>
    <meta published="1463078914" updated="1463078914" permalink="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/greg-abbott-hb2-fight-back" image="http://a5.img.talkingpointsmemo.com/image/upload/c_fill,fl_keep_iptc,g_faces,h_365,w_652/d4078lx5re0f9fmjumh4.jpg"/>
  </entry>
  <entry>
    <id>249623</id>
    <published>2016-05-12T14:30:00-04:00</published>
    <updated>2016-05-12T18:08:51-04:00</updated>
    <link rel="alternate" type="text/html" href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/trump-butler-post-obama-shot"/>
    <title>Trump's Butler Writes That Obama Should've Been Shot In His First Term</title>
    <content type="html"><p>U.S. Secret Service was investigating presumptive Republican presidential nominee Donald Trump's longtime butler, after <a href="http://www.motherjones.com/politics/2016/05/trump-butler-anthony-senecal-facebook-kill-obama#testb">Mother Jones reported</a> he wrote on <a href="https://www.facebook.com/anthonypetersenecal">Facebook</a> that he thought President Obama should've been killed in his first term.</p>

<p>The campaign went on to say it disavowed the statements the butler made as he continued to critique Obama on Thursday, telling media outlets that he would like to see the president hung from "the portico of the White House," <a href="http://www.cnn.com/2016/05/12/politics/donald-trump-butler-barack-obama/">CNN reported</a>.</p> <a href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/trump-butler-post-obama-shot" class="read-more">Read More&nbsp;&rarr;</a></content>
    <author>
      <name>Sara Jerde</name>
    </author>
    <meta published="1463077800" updated="1463090931" permalink="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/trump-butler-post-obama-shot" image="http://a4.img.talkingpointsmemo.com/image/upload/c_fill,fl_keep_iptc,g_faces,h_365,w_652/ydjkuln156ebjlvkzagq.jpg"/>
  </entry>
  <entry>
    <id>249619</id>
    <published>2016-05-12T13:02:15-04:00</published>
    <updated>2016-05-12T13:02:15-04:00</updated>
    <link rel="alternate" type="text/html" href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/boehner-house-freedom-caucus-knuckleheads"/>
    <title>House Freedom Caucus Hits Back After Boehner Calls Them 'Knuckleheads'</title>
    <content type="html"><p>Former House Speaker John Boehner (R-OH) is unplugged and unleashed and apparently reveling in his new-found freedom. </p>

<p>Not so much the so-called House Freedom Caucus.</p>

<p>During a conference in Las Vegas on Thursday, Boehner laid into the House Freedom Caucus, eliciting a response from the caucus' members.</p>

<p><blockquote class="twitter-tweet" data-lang="en"><p lang="en" dir="ltr">.<a href="https://twitter.com/SteveRattner">@SteveRattner</a> asks <a href="https://twitter.com/johnboehner">@johnboehner</a> about the Freedom Caucus. <br>
Boehner: "Knuckleheads. We call them knuckleheads."</p>

<p>— Phil Mattingly (@Phil_Mattingly) <a href="https://twitter.com/Phil_Mattingly/status/730780560696737792">May 12, 2016</a></p>

<p></blockquote></p>

<p><script async src="//platform.twitter.com/widgets.js" charset="utf-8"></script></p> <a href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/boehner-house-freedom-caucus-knuckleheads" class="read-more">Read More&nbsp;&rarr;</a></content>
    <author>
      <name>Caitlin MacNeal</name>
    </author>
    <meta published="1463072535" updated="1463072535" permalink="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/boehner-house-freedom-caucus-knuckleheads" image="http://a2.img.talkingpointsmemo.com/image/upload/c_fill,fl_keep_iptc,g_faces,h_365,w_652/xpesqc7ydbxdxqfhhmu0.jpg"/>
  </entry>
  <entry>
    <id>249614</id>
    <published>2016-05-12T12:21:00-04:00</published>
    <updated>2016-05-12T12:30:56-04:00</updated>
    <link rel="alternate" type="text/html" href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/tamron-hall-marsha-blackburn-tense-interview-trump"/>
    <title>MSNBC Host Grills GOPer On Trump: Little Late To Be Getting To Know Him! (VIDEO)</title>
    <content type="html"><p>MSNBC host Tamron Hall pushed Rep. Marsha Blackburn (R-TN) in a Thursday interview to give a straight answer on how the GOP could embrace Donald Trump as its presumptive presidential nominee, arguing it was "a little late" for the party to become “curious” about his unorthodox policy proposals.</p> <a href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/tamron-hall-marsha-blackburn-tense-interview-trump" class="read-more">Read More&nbsp;&rarr;</a></content>
    <author>
      <name>Allegra Kirkland</name>
    </author>
    <meta published="1463070060" updated="1463070656" permalink="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/tamron-hall-marsha-blackburn-tense-interview-trump" image="http://a3.img.talkingpointsmemo.com/image/upload/c_fill,fl_keep_iptc,g_faces,h_365,w_652/jbjpv0fxpcg8egh22kva.jpg"/>
  </entry>
  <entry>
    <id>249613</id>
    <published>2016-05-12T11:59:08-04:00</published>
    <updated>2016-05-12T11:59:08-04:00</updated>
    <link rel="alternate" type="text/html" href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/ryan-trump-meeting-no-endorsement"/>
    <title>Paul Ryan Still Not Endorsing Trump After Meeting: I Won't 'Fake' Unity</title>
    <content type="html"><p>House Speaker Paul Ryan (R-WI) repeatedly emphasized in a Thursday press conference that his meeting with Donald Trump was just the start of the party’s unification process, and again declined to say when or if he would endorse the presumptive GOP nominee.</p> <a href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/ryan-trump-meeting-no-endorsement" class="read-more">Read More&nbsp;&rarr;</a></content>
    <author>
      <name>Katherine Krueger</name>
    </author>
    <meta published="1463068748" updated="1463068748" permalink="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/ryan-trump-meeting-no-endorsement" image="http://a3.img.talkingpointsmemo.com/image/upload/c_fill,fl_keep_iptc,g_faces,h_365,w_652/vzbukfksbq159b62tyyd.jpg"/>
  </entry>
  <entry>
    <id>249612</id>
    <published>2016-05-12T11:52:16-04:00</published>
    <updated>2016-05-12T11:52:16-04:00</updated>
    <link rel="alternate" type="text/html" href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/priebus-ryan-trump-positive-cooperative"/>
    <title>RNC Chair: Trump Meeting With Ryan Was 'Positive' And 'Cooperative'</title>
    <content type="html"><p>Republican National Committee Chair Reince Priebus declined to provide details about House Speaker Paul Ryan's (R-WI) Thursday meeting with Donald Trump during an interview with MSNBC, but repeatedly described the meeting as "positive" and "cooperative."</p>

<p>Preibus hosted the meeting at the RNC's offices adjacent to the Capitol complex. </p>

<p>"It was a positive mood. It was a mood of cooperation and a feeling that it's time to unify the party. And I think both parties wanted to do that. It was great. It was really a positive step toward unification," Priebus said when asked about the mood at the meeting.</p> <a href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/priebus-ryan-trump-positive-cooperative" class="read-more">Read More&nbsp;&rarr;</a></content>
    <author>
      <name>Caitlin MacNeal</name>
    </author>
    <meta published="1463068336" updated="1463068336" permalink="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/priebus-ryan-trump-positive-cooperative" image="http://a5.img.talkingpointsmemo.com/image/upload/c_fill,fl_keep_iptc,g_faces,h_365,w_652/fsd6vfcbjppch6cipzoe.jpg"/>
  </entry>
  <entry>
    <id>249610</id>
    <published>2016-05-12T11:17:00-04:00</published>
    <updated>2016-05-12T11:41:12-04:00</updated>
    <link rel="alternate" type="text/html" href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/paul-ryan-donald-trump-meeting-statement"/>
    <title>Paul Ryan And Trump On RNC Meeting: 'We Were Honest' About Our Differences</title>
    <content type="html"><p>House Speaker Paul Ryan and presumptive GOP nominee Donald Trump said in a joint statement after their Thursday Capitol Hill meeting they had an "honest" conversation about their differences but took a "positive first step" toward party unity.</p> <a href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/paul-ryan-donald-trump-meeting-statement" class="read-more">Read More&nbsp;&rarr;</a></content>
    <author>
      <name>Katherine Krueger</name>
    </author>
    <meta published="1463066220" updated="1463067672" permalink="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/paul-ryan-donald-trump-meeting-statement" image="http://a1.img.talkingpointsmemo.com/image/upload/c_fill,fl_keep_iptc,g_faces,h_365,w_652/cehhtv6jggrgxh1okz3o.jpg"/>
  </entry>
  <entry>
    <id>249604</id>
    <published>2016-05-12T10:36:16-04:00</published>
    <updated>2016-05-12T10:36:16-04:00</updated>
    <link rel="alternate" type="text/html" href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/joe-biden-wanted-elizabeth-warren-vp"/>
    <title>Joe Biden Wanted Elizabeth Warren To Be His VP</title>
    <content type="html"><p>Although Vice President Joe Biden for months weighed whether to launch a third bid for the presidency, <a href="http://www.politico.com/story/2016/05/joe-biden-elizabeth-warren-223104">Politico reported</a> Thursday Biden knew he wanted Sen. Elizabeth Warren (D-MA) as his running mate from the get-go.</p> <a href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/joe-biden-wanted-elizabeth-warren-vp" class="read-more">Read More&nbsp;&rarr;</a></content>
    <author>
      <name>Katherine Krueger</name>
    </author>
    <meta published="1463063776" updated="1463063776" permalink="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/joe-biden-wanted-elizabeth-warren-vp" image="http://a1.img.talkingpointsmemo.com/image/upload/c_fill,fl_keep_iptc,g_faces,h_365,w_652/om7cmkitvbbkvpiszyu4.jpg"/>
  </entry>
  <entry>
    <id>249603</id>
    <published>2016-05-12T10:20:00-04:00</published>
    <updated>2016-05-12T10:20:55-04:00</updated>
    <link rel="alternate" type="text/html" href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/reince-preibus-trump-ryan-meeting-great"/>
    <title>RNC Chair: Trump's Meeting With Ryan A 'Positive Step' For GOP Unity</title>
    <content type="html"><p>Republican National Chairman Reince Preibus tweeted Thursday that Donald Trump's meeting with House Speaker Paul Ryan (R-WI) on Capitol Hill was a "positive step" toward uniting the party.</p> <a href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/reince-preibus-trump-ryan-meeting-great" class="read-more">Read More&nbsp;&rarr;</a></content>
    <author>
      <name>Sara Jerde</name>
    </author>
    <meta published="1463062800" updated="1463062855" permalink="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/reince-preibus-trump-ryan-meeting-great" image="http://a5.img.talkingpointsmemo.com/image/upload/c_fill,fl_keep_iptc,g_faces,h_365,w_652/lfouzgthafjr1kzhal78.jpg"/>
  </entry>
  <entry>
    <id>249602</id>
    <published>2016-05-12T10:13:24-04:00</published>
    <updated>2016-05-12T10:13:24-04:00</updated>
    <link rel="alternate" type="text/html" href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/reid-mcconnell-must-agree-trump-women"/>
    <title>Reid On McConnell Backing Trump: He Must Think Women Are 'Dogs,' Too</title>
    <content type="html"><p>In a fiery Senate floor speech as Donald Trump met with top party officials Thursday on Capitol Hill, Minority Leader Harry Reid (D-NV) slammed Majority Leader Mitch McConnell (R-KY) for embracing the billionaire, saying he must agree with <a href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/trump-women-comments-came-before-running-for-office">Trump’s views</a> that women “are dogs and pigs.”</p> <a href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/reid-mcconnell-must-agree-trump-women" class="read-more">Read More&nbsp;&rarr;</a></content>
    <author>
      <name>Katherine Krueger</name>
    </author>
    <meta published="1463062404" updated="1463062404" permalink="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/reid-mcconnell-must-agree-trump-women" image="http://a5.img.talkingpointsmemo.com/image/upload/c_fill,fl_keep_iptc,g_faces,h_365,w_652/lgwzsbpudoawz9d211hj.jpg"/>
  </entry>
  <entry>
    <id>249601</id>
    <published>2016-05-12T09:58:00-04:00</published>
    <updated>2016-05-12T10:10:36-04:00</updated>
    <link rel="alternate" type="text/html" href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/trump-muslim-ban-suggestion"/>
    <title>Trump Says Muslim Ban Was 'Just A Suggestion’ Ahead Of Ryan Meeting</title>
    <content type="html"><p>Presumptive GOP nominee Donald Trump on Wednesday slightly backed off his proposal to put a hold on Muslim immigration into the United States, saying it was just a “suggestion.”</p>

<p>“We have a serious problem. It’s a temporary ban. It hasn’t been called for yet. Nobody’s done it. This is just a suggestion until we find out what’s going on,” Trump told Fox News’ Brian Kilmeade in a radio interview.</p> <a href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/trump-muslim-ban-suggestion" class="read-more">Read More&nbsp;&rarr;</a></content>
    <author>
      <name>Allegra Kirkland</name>
    </author>
    <meta published="1463061480" updated="1463062236" permalink="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/trump-muslim-ban-suggestion" image="http://a3.img.talkingpointsmemo.com/image/upload/c_fill,fl_keep_iptc,g_faces,h_365,w_652/bkfcihbljcutunfy7uzx.jpg"/>
  </entry>
  <entry>
    <id>249600</id>
    <published>2016-05-12T09:45:35-04:00</published>
    <updated>2016-05-12T09:45:35-04:00</updated>
    <link rel="alternate" type="text/html" href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/lobbyists-pressure-hb2-north-carolina"/>
    <title>NC GOP Lawmakers Reportedly Pressure Lobbyists To Stay Silent On HB2--Or Else</title>
    <content type="html"><p>North Carolina Republican lawmakers have been threatening lobbyists with retribution if the businesses they represent speak out against the state's new controversial anti-LGBT law, according to a report from Raleigh television station <a href="http://www.wral.com/lobbyists-lawmakers-seek-to-quiet-hb2-opponents/15698344/">WRAL</a>.</p>

<p>WRAL interviewed 11 lobbyists who said they have been warned by lawmakers or staff members about the potential for legislation targeting their clients or attempts to block legislation that lobbyists have been pushing. None of the lobbyists spoke on the record.</p> <a href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/lobbyists-pressure-hb2-north-carolina" class="read-more">Read More&nbsp;&rarr;</a></content>
    <author>
      <name>Caitlin MacNeal</name>
    </author>
    <meta published="1463060735" updated="1463060735" permalink="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/lobbyists-pressure-hb2-north-carolina" image="http://a3.img.talkingpointsmemo.com/image/upload/c_fill,fl_keep_iptc,g_faces,h_365,w_652/we8jtstws2vb29g6ndka.jpg"/>
  </entry>
  <entry>
    <id>249595</id>
    <published>2016-05-12T08:59:00-04:00</published>
    <updated>2016-05-12T10:56:39-04:00</updated>
    <link rel="alternate" type="text/html" href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/donald-trump-paul-ryan-meeting-rnc"/>
    <title>Donald Trump Arrives At RNC For Meeting With House Speaker Paul Ryan (PHOTOS)</title>
    <content type="html"><p>Shortly before 9 a.m. Thursday, presumptive GOP nominee Donald Trump arrived at the Republican National Committee's Washington office for his much-anticipated meeting with House Speaker Paul Ryan (R-WI).</p> <a href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/donald-trump-paul-ryan-meeting-rnc" class="read-more">Read More&nbsp;&rarr;</a></content>
    <author>
      <name>Katherine Krueger</name>
    </author>

  </entry>

    <title>Elizabeth Warren Goes Off On Anti-Trump Twitter Rant: 'Your Free Ride Is Over'</title>
    <content type="html"><p>This <a href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/elizabeth-warren-donald-trump-twitter-fight">Twitter feud</a> isn't dying down: Sen. Elizabeth Warren (D-MA) fired back at presumptive GOP nominee Donald Trump on Wednesday night, calling him "pathetic" and his rhetoric "reckless."</p> <a href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/elizabeth-warren-donald-trump-twitter-feud" class="read-more">Read More&nbsp;&rarr;</a></content>

  <entry>
    <id>249590</id>
    <published>2016-05-12T08:17:22-04:00</published>
    <updated>2016-05-12T08:17:22-04:00</updated>
    <link rel="alternate" type="text/html" href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/trump-london-mayor-denies-islamic-terrorism"/>
    <title>Trump: I 'Assume' London Mayor 'Denies That There's Islamic Terrorism'</title>
    <content type="html"><p>Donald Trump on Wednesday hit back at the new London mayor, who this week criticized the presumptive Republican presidential nominee's proposed ban on Muslims entering the United States.</p>

<p>"Well, I assume he denies that there’s Islamic terrorism. If you look at this radical Islamic terrorism all over the world right now, it’s a disaster what’s going on. I assume he’s denying that. I assume he’s like our President that’s denying it’s taking place," <a href="http://radio.foxnews.com/2016/05/11/kilmeades-wide-ranging-interview-w-donald-trump-on-his-vp-shortlist-joe-biden-newly-elected-london-mayor-megyn-kellys-special-more/">Trump said on Fox News radio's "Kilmeade and Friends"</a> when asked about the London Mayor Sadiq Khan's comments.</p> <a href="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/trump-london-mayor-denies-islamic-terrorism" class="read-more">Read More&nbsp;&rarr;</a></content>
    <author>
      <name>Caitlin MacNeal</name>
    </author>
    <meta published="1463055442" updated="1463055442" permalink="http://talkingpointsmemo.com/livewire/trump-london-mayor-denies-islamic-terrorism" image="http://a5.img.talkingpointsmemo.com/image/upload/c_fill,fl_keep_iptc,g_faces,h_365,w_652/fsk32bnxmzai0g4bjg4s.jpg"/>
  </entry>
